snippet.title: Hyper Sentinel Fusion | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Roguelite shoot-em-up action. Destroy the defences of procedurally-generated space titans. Plunder the depths with your droid. Spend your bounty on upgrades & explore the moonbase hub.

Follow the Kickstarter: https://bit.ly/hsfusion

Music by FASSOUNDS - https://fassounds.com/patreon
